product_name: Thule Chariot Cougar 1 Stroller with Stroller Kit
long_description: A single-child stroller with suspension, rear cargo space and a place to mount extra conversion kits, this reliable stroller has large 20-inch rear wheels that roll easily on or off paved pathways.
short_description: A single-child stroller with suspension, rear cargo space and a place to mount extra conversion kits, this reliable stroller has large 20-inch rear wheels that roll easily on or off paved pathways.
